Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_bell_select

This register is used select which bits in the doorbell packet are used to provide the 4 bit address and 4 bit index into the lookup table specified in SRIO()_BELL_LOOKUP[0:15]. Each address and index has a 6-bit selector to pick a bit out of the incoming doorbell using the following:

35-34 Doorbell Priority [1:0]. 33 Secondary ID (1=Packet Matched Enabled Secondary ID8 or ID16). 32 ID8/ID16 bit (1=Packet used 16-bit Device IDs). 31-16 Source ID [15:0]. 15-0 Doorbell Payload [15:0].

This register is reset by the h-clock reset.
